channel.title: Need server help :(!
channel.description:
Alright im new to servers and am working on planet pks source. Ive pretty much changed everything to mine. But im having a problem adding shops :S. Theres a whole bunch of shops already in the shops.cfg but idk how to find them :S please help !
heres picture
[URL=http://img85.imageshack.us/i/shopsm.png/][IMG]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/8435/shopsm.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Need server help :(!
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“malie, post:7, topic:422196”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=524868.msg3820458#msg3820458 date=1321733403]

if(NPCID == 683){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 33; }

Yea like i said im new to all this stuff :\ I added random people like giles to the rsps and they have items in them but there all way over priced :S all i did was went to autospawn and just added there character id but i still dont know what im doing at all :S

So what exactly do you want?

Idk i just want to add shops and adjust the items in there and the prices. Or is it just easier to make it a spawn server? or would i have to start with a whole different source ?

For the shops it says if npc id is 683 then open shop 33 in your shops.cfg file. To edit prices go to item.cfg

The 103000 is approximately the amount of GP required to buy.
[/quote]

have you looked at my pictures? I dont get were it says the npc id[/quote]
the if npc id is in client.java.

Read full topic

Yea like i said im new to all this stuff :\ I added random people like giles to the rsps and they have items in them but there all way over priced :S all i did was went to autospawn and just added there character id but i still dont know what im doing at all :S

So what exactly do you want?

Idk i just want to add shops and adjust the items in there and the prices. Or is it just easier to make it a spawn server? or would i have to start with a whole different source ?
[/quote]
For the shops it says if npc id is 683 then open shop 33 in your shops.cfg file. To edit prices go to item.cfg

The 103000 is approximately the amount of GP required to buy.[/quote]

have you looked at my pictures? I dont get were it says the npc id

item.title: Need server help :(!
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“malie, post:5, topic:422196”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=524868.msg3820437#msg3820437 date=1321732389]

if(NPCID == 683){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 33; }

Yea like i said im new to all this stuff :\ I added random people like giles to the rsps and they have items in them but there all way over priced :S all i did was went to autospawn and just added there character id but i still dont know what im doing at all :S

So what exactly do you want?
[/quote]

Idk i just want to add shops and adjust the items in there and the prices. Or is it just easier to make it a spawn server? or would i have to start with a whole different source ?[/quote]
For the shops it says if npc id is 683 then open shop 33 in your shops.cfg file. To edit prices go to item.cfg

The 103000 is approximately the amount of GP required to buy.
